changeSet.sql: CREATE TYPE TerraExecutor AS ( id bigint, -- unique to this table workspace text, -- the fully-qualified 'Namespace/Name' of the Terra workspace to execute workflows in methodConfiguration text, -- the fully-qualified 'Namespace/Name' of the method configuration used to create submissions version text, -- the version of the method configuration entity text, -- the entity type to import data from the source as details text, -- the identifier of the executor details table fromSource text -- mapping of how to coerce the output of source to executor )
